text: phraxngkh thrng srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin dwy khwam cring xan chad cæng phraxngkh thrng hı klangkhun khabkeiyw kheapi nı klangwan læa thrng hı klangwan khabkeiyw kheapi nı klangkhun læa thrng hı dwng xathity læa dwng canthr pen prayochn (kæ mnusʹy) thuk sing khocr pi tam wara thi di kahnd wi phung thrab theid phraxngkh pen phuthrng xanac phuthrng xphay xyang mak
